questions.question: What is the dominant color of the main body of the product?
What is the primary material apparent in the product's construction?
What is the overall three-dimensional shape of the product?
Describe the visible texture of the product's top surface?
What is the color of the visible base or bottom section?
What mechanical component is visibly present inside the product?
What is the text printed on the visible surface of the product?
What is the apparent shape of the opening or receptacle within?
Is there a visible indication of a dispensing mechanism?
What is the overall design style of the product?
Describe the color of the text visible on the product.
Is the product's surface glossy or matte?
Does the product appear to have any noticeable seams or joins?
What is the apparent finish of the plastic used in the product?
Is the product's form factor mostly vertical or horizontal?
